website_summaries.verdict: Minecraft lovers can use this book to deepen their science skills.
pros: Comprehensive coverage of sciences including botany, chemistry, and physics
Suitable for upper elementary through high school
cons: Supplementary materials are needed (often in the form of books and online text) to complete some assignments

customer_reviews.title: Whoops, my bad. Not what I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for science books for my 13 yr old, who also loves Minecraft. Was hopeful this would have some projects to do in Minecraft to demonstrate various science functions. Nope. It's basically a home-school workbook. Fill-in-the-blank pages. Meh. Neither of us are thrilled. Probably will sit on a shelf until it goes to Goodwill. Win some, lose some.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing science!
customer_reviews.text: This books is amazing. I am always excited for books , but when my children are excited then you know it is something special! We will use this book over a two year period because my children are 6&7 so we want to use this for our science alongside our co-op. I also want to say you do not need to homeschool to use this book, you can use it alongside the child's school Or even with their current science class!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful book. My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful book. My kids love it. It is very detailed and encourages children to research and learn about the different branches of science. It adds a wonderful Minecraft element that makes this book feel fun instead of being just another workbook to trudge through. It is thorough and well planned out. I particularly love that at the end of each section it teaches kids about the different career paths for each branch of science. It allowed my children to understand how to relate the science they learned about to real life careers. I highly recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Fun science learning
customer_reviews.text: This science journal.qas one of the first we used in our journey to funschooling. I have 3 teens using it. They are learning so much about these subjects & are having fun doing it. We needed something more enjoyable & this was it! All you need are library books to go with it &you are all set!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Crumb  Fun

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC BOOK!
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC BOOK!!!!! My middle school boys couldn't wait for school to start, so they started working in it this summer. The sections are just long enough to keep their interest, but still get a nice, thorough study of each branch of science.
customer_reviews.author: J&A S.

customer_reviews.title: If you want no structure and very little direction...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed so far. Lacks a lot of depth. Definitely not a complete curriculum and you will have to do a lot of work supplementing and filling in the gaps. Not near as exciting as the the cover led it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelylacey

customer_reviews.title: A student notebook to do reports with
customer_reviews.text: This book covers several areas of science and is meant for one student to do reports on each of these sciences. The do reports with other things - dvds, reading - then create on Minecraft. It was not suitable for my tutoring, but I passed it on to a teacher and she was excited to try it with a student of hers.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old Minecraft-phile loves this book. She ...
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old Minecraft-phile loves this book. She has worked through the first Thinking Tree Do It Yourself Minecraft book and already enjoys this one more.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Missing sections/pages
customer_reviews.text: According to the table of contents, this books should have 7 science subjects with over 250 pages. The book we received only contains 3 full subjects and part of a 4th. Physics, Technology and Zoology are completely missing and the book only has 152 pages. I attempted to contact funschoolingbooks directly but received no reply. Essentially only received half a book. Unfortunately, we had already marked the book before we noticed the missing portions so did not attempt an Amazon return:(
customer_reviews.author: Christine Long

customer_reviews.title: Requires a ton of additional books & supplies to complete!
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere in the description for this item does it say that you will need to buy 4 books and a documentary for EACH science subject. 7 subjects = 28 books and 7 documentaries (good luck finding those) just to complete this activity book!! Not cool 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sara L.

customer_reviews.title: 7 subject science- minecraft
customer_reviews.text: I found the book to be difficult. When I purchased the book for my nephew I thought it would be something he can pick up and read. But the book is empty, and he has to fill in. I thought it it was a science book! 🙁 If I could return it , I would but he wrote on it. Will never purchase another science book from minecraft again.

customer_reviews.title: Another great Thinling tree journal
customer_reviews.text: We love Thinking tree journals! This is a perfect journal to review several areas in Science. This journal is perfect for kids\ teens whom love Minecraft and science. We use these journals with my daughter who has Dyslexia, they help get her excited about school. This journal was perfect for us to keep a portpholio for science.
customer_reviews.author: demeskir

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant concept turned into a wonderful book
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant concept turned into a wonderful book! It gives you a great layout and the space for real on depth learning on each branch of science. I am using it for my 9 & 11 year old but it could be used all the way up through high school. As always we are impressed with thinking tree.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to start!
customer_reviews.text: We got this in and my son 11, can’t wait to start. Some of The items inside look a little advanced for him, but he keeps looking at it and wants to start. He is finishing up another Fun Schooling journal called active boys. And will start this one next semester.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine asuncion

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Minecraft Pro's or Newbies!
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter both love this one! This book is geared towards 10 to 17 years old.This book is will appeal to older kids in that it is not a kiddie book. But if you have an younger child that need a challenge this book is it. The subjects that they address in this book, with research, exploring job in the science field. The list goes on and it is beautiful. The attention to detail in this book is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: A cool way to do harder Science Topics making it Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Love this book! The attention to detail is awesome! I love the way the book is broken down in 7 areas of science. You can use the book for younger ones with guidance. This book can last years for younger ones. If you are using it for Middle School and High School it could last the way you like it to. I personally will be using it for High School with High School Books and I will also use the Science Portfolio to keep all projects along with this book. This is a great book.
customer_reviews.author: HomeschoolingandOils

customer_reviews.title: Great Resource!
customer_reviews.text: Great resource! Our boy/girl twins age 12 are both loving this book. Each of our kids started with a different topic and sometimes they will do a page or two on a different topic. It's nice that they have the flexibility to jump around and do the pages that they are interested in at the time. It is keeping them interested and it's fun listening to them talk about the things they are learning. We are loving the books from Thinking Tree. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: blessedwith_twins

customer_reviews.title: For the kids (10+) who Love a science & minecraft
customer_reviews.text: So I could spend every day reading history with my son but don't ask me to do science with him. This journal is just the ticket and I'm so glad he received it as a gift. He is learning so much as he researches and discovers what he wants to know within the guidelines. He is teaching me so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: This is a great book to study and write down different science subjects
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book to study and write down different science subjects. I bought the PDF version (first version) since it was in color. The illustrations are great. What I like is that you or your child can choose any book or curriculum and fill out the portfolio book with what you want. It can be used over several years also. I look forward to my children using this book.
customer_reviews.author: BatMom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!

If your kiddos loves minecraft like mine do they will love this science book.There are several different topic areas for them to explore including but not limited to botany and electronics. You just can't go wrong with this book.
